channel.title: Client crash!
channel.description:
When i tried to mage from distance everyone crashed in server, sometimes this happens with melee when you missclick, everyone disconnects.
Everyone gets this error on client:
Error: Error packet size mismatch in getplayer pos:61 psize:65 urlstream Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 103 at client.method34(client.java:1428) at client.method146(client.java:12205) at client.method102(client.java:7924) at client.method9(client.java:8841) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:122) at client.run(client.java:4464) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/hsvn8p.jpg[/img]
How can i fix this?

item.title: Client crash!
item.dc:creator: @scriptz scriptz
item.description:
@scriptz wrote:

When i tried to mage from distance everyone crashed in server, sometimes this happens with melee when you missclick, everyone disconnects.

Everyone gets this error on client:

Error: Error packet size mismatch in getplayer pos:61 psize:65
urlstream
